website_summaries.verdict: When you want the best replacement touring tires for your bike, this is a premium brand.
pros: Tires are constructed in the United States, so you can trust the quality of the materials
The style of the tread in this tire will wear evenly, and it doesn’t generate extra noise
Includes grip on the edges of the tire to help with safe cornering
cons: Doesn’t perform the best on wet roads

customer_reviews.title: This American Elite tire is A LOT cheaper in price ...
customer_reviews.text: This American Elite tire is A LOT cheaper in price than buying a 'Harley Davidson Dunlop' tire. This American Elite tire is a replacement for the American Elite tire that I mounted on my Bike two years (and 15,000-miles) ago.I After riding 15,000-miles of 'Cross-Country' miles on the American Elite tire that is currently on my Harley Street Glide, my tire still has adequate tread remaining on it for 'Around-Town' and short rides. I bought this tire so that I can have 'Fresh-Rubber' on my Harley before I ride (6,000-miles) to Idaho next month.
customer_reviews.author: Namgrunt66

customer_reviews.title: The One I Use
customer_reviews.text: There are a number of brands an models of tires that are very good. I have been riding for a very long time and have tried most of them. I have gotten the best wear and performance balance from this tire on my H-D Ultra Limited.
customer_reviews.author: Fred B

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely the best performing tires in BOTH Wet & Dry weather
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these tires. I currently use these 100% USA manufactured tires on my Ultra Classic and they give me maximum performance and superior handling and cornering capabilities. You cannot go wrong with these American Elite tires for your Harley Davidson...PERIOD!
customer_reviews.author: Man of Steel

customer_reviews.title: Nice price on a very good tire
customer_reviews.text: These newer tires last a lot longer than tires made 20 years ago. Back then a tire might last 3,000 - 5,000 miles. My last rear tire lasted for over 15,000 miles. When I replaced it, before a long trip, there was still another 1,000 miles or more left on the tread life
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: The Dunlop American elite tires I give a five star ...
customer_reviews.text: The Dunlop American elite tires I give a five star rating in all categories. First set I got over 16000 miles on them and they still passed inspection this year. (The inspector said they were not going to make it another year but we're still legal tires). I just ordered and received a new pair as I am riding my 2012 HD Street Glide from Central Vermont to Sturgis at the end of this month and wanted a tire I could trust for the aproxamately 4000 miles out and back at 70+ MPH.
customer_reviews.author: Nick N.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire, Great ride, Great handling, Rain or snow, yes rode in the snow before
customer_reviews.text: This is what I exclusively use on my 17 FLHTCU. I'm not getting the 15,000 miles that other are claiming. Best I've done is around 8,000 miles. I ride hard, Only time I break the back tire loose is when the tire is at the end of it's life and I need to heat it up to change it. No the American Elite's I use on the front last twice as long as the rears.
customer_reviews.author: John Estelle

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original one that came with the bike
customer_reviews.text: Just like the original one that came with the bike. This will be my 2nd replacement. Last one had over 20k before it was time to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Bi Ko

customer_reviews.title: 09 Streetglide
customer_reviews.text: Only tire I use on my 2009 FLHX Streetglide. I ride. 158,000 miles on this scooter. I won't buy any other rubber for her.
customer_reviews.author: ZippyDo

customer_reviews.title: Best tire so far
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to OEM Dunlop at $100 less. A little better mileage than OEM...12k on OEM and 17k on first American Elite. I had tried Metzlers before and they were great but lasted 8k.
customer_reviews.author: Z3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Rear tire, replaced the stock model on an 11 Street Glide.
customer_reviews.author: TVWatcher

customer_reviews.title: Not as long-lasting as OE tire
customer_reviews.text: This is an ‘almost’ OE replacement. It’s the same as my 2016 FLHTCU OE rear tire in fit and function. However this tire has not lasted near as long as the factory-supplied copy.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Great tire, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the Dunlop Harley tire or the Commander II, both in the wet and on road imperfections. As far as milage, we'll see. As of now, definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Early

customer_reviews.title: Always given great service and longevity
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this tire several times for my bikes. Always given great service and longevity. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great tire in all weather.
customer_reviews.text: I do over 20,000 miles a year, in all kinds of weather. Never had an issue with these tires. Great in wet weather, twisty corners, not to mention I get about 20,000 miles a set. I'm on my third set and about to start looking for my fourth.
customer_reviews.author: TechNerd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, not many miles on it as of yet but seems like a very good tire
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've always liked Dunlop. Gives me good handling and mileage
customer_reviews.text: Put on a 2014 Harley Road King. I've always liked Dunlop. Gives me good handling and mileage.
customer_reviews.author: hpower

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to many miles ahead happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really say what the longevity or the mileage or the value is quite yet but already I can tell that they are the smooth riding turning tire that I wanted. Very smooth through cracks and pavement filler. Looking forward to figuring how far these will go but so far I am happy with the results even the riding.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beirman

customer_reviews.title: Buy your Rubber here!!
customer_reviews.text: As long as I ride my HOG, I will buy my rubber here. My mechanic is surprised an outlet like this ensures I get the most recent born on dates.
customer_reviews.author: Owl-Cher

customer_reviews.title: Balance Issues
customer_reviews.text: Great Tire, I’ve use 4 sets + on my bikes. Price greatly increased since last purchase. But... This one required 1.25 oz weight to balance even after aligning the “dot” with the air stem. Needed for a Charity Ride. Didn’t have time to return.
customer_reviews.author: Boss

customer_reviews.title: great tire
customer_reviews.text: great tire, this is the second one I install, 22000 miles on the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell L. Mccann

customer_reviews.title: just exactly what i ordered.  speedy delivery too.
customer_reviews.text: these tires are the best for me and my cycle. love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and looks great on my 2012 FLHTCU A+++
customer_reviews.author: David J McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Can't give a good rating because I haven't put alot of miles on yet but they handle great.
customer_reviews.text: Really can't give you a rating so far I like this tire cost was good compared to dealerships I only have a few miles on it seems to be wearing well.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth schuler

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only have a couple thousand miles on it so and and really like it. Even on wet roads it does great
customer_reviews.author: jeff Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2010 street glide. I’ve had great experiences with these tires. I ride in all kinds of weather.
customer_reviews.author: justin r sands

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price, great durability, tread is wearing perfectly. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly fenn

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Daye code 4318. So only 5 months old.
customer_reviews.author: rose brocksmith

customer_reviews.title: Wear like Iron
customer_reviews.text: Great version of the original tires put on most new Harley touring bikes. Dual compound is great for cornering and the center tread seems to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and well made! This is the second set I've bought for my Electra Glide.
customer_reviews.author: 918 Marine

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my 2014 Harley Street Glide Special rear tire.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my 2014 Harley Street Glide Special rear tire.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great tire. I get about 15
customer_reviews.text: Great tire. I get about 15,000 miles on the rear tire.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: Would of given it 5 stars if it didn’t have ...
customer_reviews.text: Would of given it 5 stars if it didn’t have sidewall damage from being stacked at factory . I went through all the trouble of installing it and paying for a mount and balance and after I put it on I notice large diviot in sidewall .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great handling and smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Tires put on before Sturgis. Great handling and smooth ride . Recommend to anyone that wants a good tire. Saved money on tires vs dealer price of HD tires .
customer_reviews.author: born2 ride

customer_reviews.title: Cost Saver
customer_reviews.text: Great tire. I saved a $100 over buying one from HD. Same tire same great mileage.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seem to be just as good as stock tire need more miles to tell
customer_reviews.author: 14harley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tire feels good guess we c how it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Wvzag

customer_reviews.title: Rain or shine the tire performs great
customer_reviews.text: I ride my street glide between San Jose and Santa Cruz every day. Rain or shine the tire performs great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, I've been getting about 10k miles on these tires.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tire and price.
customer_reviews.text: Tire looks great on the bike. Handles better than H-D tire wet/dry
customer_reviews.author: Bob Howland

customer_reviews.title: I always run theses tire on my Harley never had ...
customer_reviews.text: I always run theses tire on my Harley never had a problem! You know what they say if it work why change
customer_reviews.author: Walter B Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big difference in ride quality! Previously used Harley OEM tires D204.
customer_reviews.author: PMO13

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: This tire has a manufacturer defect. How can I get it replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Kiagirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never had any trouble out of these tires and I get my money's worth out of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tire for a Awesome price. Fast Service as always.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: ... Harley Dealer except tread a little different and alot better price!
customer_reviews.text: Same tire you would buy from Harley Dealer except tread a little different and alot better price!
customer_reviews.author: c j holzshujr

product_meta.title: Dunlop American Elite Rear All Season Radial Tire - 180/65-16 81H
product_meta.description: The American Elite delivers enhanced tire mileage due to the MT Multi-Tread rear tire compound. This compound incorporates a long-wearing compound centered on the tire. There is also a lateral-grip compound on each shoulder to improve handling.
feature_bullets: Dunlop’s American Elite is a leading aftermarket choice for riders in search of tires that have extended tread wear

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
